remarks: Division of two ratios.  Theorem I.15 of [Apostol] p. 18.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
div1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
divmuldivd.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
divmuldivd.5 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
divmuldivd.6 $e |- ( ph -> D =/= 0 ) $.
divdivdivd.7 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
divdivdivd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) / ( C / D ) ) = ( ( A x. D ) / ( B x. C ) ) ) $.
